text: Greater Houston, designated by the United States Office of Management and Budget as Houston–Pasadena–The Woodlands, is the fifth-most populous metropolitan statistical area in the United States. It is made up of ten counties along the Gulf Coast in Southeast Texas. With a population of 7.1 million people as of the 2020 census and nearly 7.8 million in 2024, Greater Houston is the second-most populous in Texas after the Dallas–Fort Worth metroplex. ==References== Category:Houston Category:Metropolitan areas of the United States
title: Greater Houston
